data.message:
Don't be sad tho illuminati piece of shit, I just don't date man who fuck lil children or pay their parents to be loved. It takes a scumbag to loose the natural parental love you had and tons of money to buy it back. 
All the twat can do is flip you, look at me I impact the world poorly and I don't even give a fuck kind of thing. 
Well at least if you pay mom enough she'd fuck you should be refreshing then all them 9 year old girls. Just an opinion. Side View. Yup pedos and incest never turned me on. Should I apologize for it ? Some one thinks I should. Gross
